summary: Completed comprehensive testing of G&A Pallet website - professional black theme marketing site with React frontend and FastAPI backend. All core functionality working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Success toast notification may not be displaying properly after form submission
ui_bugs.details: Form submits successfully to backend but success message not consistently visible to user

passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (/api/, /api/health)
Contact form API endpoint (/api/contact) - POST and GET
Quote form API endpoint (/api/quote) - POST and GET
API error handling with validation
Home page loads with hero section and navigation
Navigation works for all pages (Home, About, Services, Machinery, Pallets, Contact)
About, Services, Machinery pages load with content
Pallets page displays 6 pallet types correctly
Contact page displays OpenStreetMap with correct location marker
Contact page shows 4 contact info cards
Phone number (713) 670-8118 displayed correctly across site
Email sales@gapallet.com displayed correctly across site
Address 8827 Clinton Dr, Houston, TX 77029 displayed correctly
Footer displays on all pages with correct contact information
Professional black theme with green accents (#22C55E) implemented
Contact form fills and submits to backend successfully
Quote form fills and submits to backend successfully (API confirmed)
Leaflet map loads with tiles and green marker at G&A Pallet location
All navigation links functional between pages
Responsive design elements present
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement: Ensure success toast notifications are consistently visible after form submissions. The backend API is working correctly, but users may not see confirmation messages.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor toast notification issue
